security_audit.summary: The skill is documentation-only with examples in SKILL.md and two metadata JSON files. No executable code, network calls, or system access found. Safe to publish.

content.user_title: Build Godot 4 systems with GDScript patterns
content.value_statement: You need reliable patterns for Godot gameplay systems. This skill provides proven GDScript structures and performance guidance.
actual_capabilities: Explain Godot node, scene, resource, and signal architecture
Provide state machine and base State patterns in GDScript
Describe autoload singletons and a global event bus
Show resource based data models for weapons and stats
Outline object pooling and pooled actor lifecycles
Describe scene loading, transitions, and save system flow
limitations: Focuses on Godot 4.x GDScript patterns only
Does not generate full projects, assets, or scenes
Does not run benchmarks or validate performance claims
Encryption key examples require your own secure key

use_cases.title: Reduce frame spikes

use_cases.description: Adopt consistent guidance for signals, resources, and save systems.

prompt_templates.title: Starter architecture
prompt_templates.prompt: Recommend a basic scene tree and signal flow for a top down shooter in Godot 4.

prompt_templates.title: State machine plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a state machine for idle, move, attack, and jump with clean transitions.

prompt_templates.title: Pooling strategy
prompt_templates.prompt: Show how to use object pooling for bullets with spawn and despawn callbacks.

prompt_templates.title: Save system design
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline a save and load system for player stats and position using resources.

output_examples.input: Give me a scene management approach with loading feedback for Godot 4.
output: Use an autoload scene manager to swap scenes and emit progress signals
Load scenes asynchronously with threaded loading for smooth feedback
Show a loading scene while progress updates are emitted
Play a transition before and after the scene swap

best_practices: Use signals to decouple scenes and systems
Cache node references on ready for hot paths
anti_patterns: Using autoloads for non global features

faq.question: Is this compatible with Godot 4.x?
faq.answer: Yes. The patterns target Godot 4.x GDScript APIs.

faq.question: What does it not cover?
faq.answer: It does not cover multiplayer networking, editor tooling, or asset pipelines.

faq.question: Can I integrate it into an existing project?
faq.answer: Yes. Adapt the patterns to your current scenes and scripts.

faq.question: Does it access my files or secrets?
faq.answer: No. The skill content is documentation only.

faq.question: What if a pattern does not work for my game?
faq.answer: Start with a small prototype and refine the pattern to fit your needs.

faq.question: How is this different from the Godot docs?
faq.answer: It focuses on reusable patterns rather than full API reference coverage.
